newsitem.title: INDIA: India gold closes steady, silver up.
newsitem.headline: India gold closes steady, silver up.

text.p: ** Gold 24 carat closed steady at 4,640 rupees per 10 gramme against the previous close as well as against the opening level as limited arrivals matched poor physical buying.
** Prices of a gold biscuit (116.50 gramme) closed steady at 54,300 rupees per piece against the previous close as prices fluctuated in a narrow range during the day amid limited activity.

** Silver (.999) closed 15 rupees higher at 6,740 rupees per kg against the previous close of 6,725 rupees but down 15 rupees against the opening level of 6,755 rupees as sluggish industrial demand dragged prices lower towards the close after a firm start.
